name: SAMA SAMAJA MANDALI

address: Street No. 7, VNC no. 160 Vinayaka Nagar Colony

briefDescription: The SAMA SAMAJA MANDALI is a voluntary organization and established to serve for all the poorest of the poor and their children irrespective of casts,creed or race in Rural and Urban Slum areas of all districts in the State of Telangana National & International.
